metadata.title: CVE-2019-14442 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In mpc8_read_header in libavformat/mpc8.c in Libav 12.3, an input file canresult in an avio_seek infinite loop and hang, with 100% CPU consumption.Attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of servicevia a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
